data.what_is: PursueApp is a powerful SAAS that helps to get more sales through effective cold email marketing. It is a complete cold email marketing package for agencies and B2B businesses. Along with PursueApp, marketers will also receive a detailed roadmap on how to get more leads through effective cold emailing.
data.product_description: PursueApp is a powerful SAAS that helps to get more sales through effective cold email marketing. It is a complete cold email marketing package for agencies and B2B businesses. Along with PursueApp, marketers will also receive a detailed roadmap on how to get more leads through effective cold emailing.

initial_reviews.review_title: You want to pay a one time fee and be done with it or pay every month for an auto responder
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about PursueApp?
It took a while for me to get to it beca

What do you dislike about PursueApp?
use I was not ready in my funnel yet. However I purchased the software knowing I would get there. An autoresponder is a must in online biz. I ran into some problems but that is more to my newness. The team helped me to clear the issues and now it works like a charm.

Recommendations to others considering PursueApp:
You CAN DO IT. Buy the software and study and apply yourself.

What problems is PursueApp solving and how is that benefiting you?
Did I say auto responder YET! Wow Jeet has really put the work and the know how into this software for you to get the maximum benefit. I assume he by default goes over and beyond his promises and that in essence will make him in the long run a huge player in the industry.

initial_reviews.review_title: Unwavering Tech Support to fix an issue
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about PursueApp?
Just started using it but hit some snags with server issues and the support worked hard over 3 days until it was fixed so restored my confidence.

What do you dislike about PursueApp?
API connection could be faster...maybe better hosting ?

What problems is PursueApp solving and how is that benefiting you?
Lead capture and Cold email marketing!

initial_reviews.review_title: Amazing support. Very kind and fast.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about PursueApp?
The fast and precise response by providing exact solutions.

What do you dislike about PursueApp?
Nothing. All of the messages were short and useful.

What problems is PursueApp solving and how is that benefiting you?
Email Footer did not display well.

Now I have the footer operative.
